Name: Valley of Dragons
About the game: Love dragons? Want to raise a dragon of your own? Valley of Dragons is a VR game where you raise up your own personal dragon from an egg to an adult through feeding, petting, and playing with your dragon. Along the way, be prepared to teach it how to hunt, fly, and defend itself!
